short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to play a memory direction game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This game is a memory game that helps the user's brain development. Anyone of any age can easily enjoy it, and if you successfully complete up to 10 levels and share your certification, you can receive a prize through a random recommendation.
